item.description:
Valley Cemetery Walking Tour
Sunday, October 17, 2010
1:30 p.m.-3:30 p.m.
$5 MHA members, $10 general public
Pre-registration is required

This tour will explore the stories of some of Manchesterâ€™s most colorful citizens, both founders of the Victorian-era city, as well as common folk. Aurore Eaton, MHA Executive Director, will quote from published and unpublished materials written by and about these very interesting people, as well as from writings that reveal something about the times they lived in. The tour will also highlight ongoing volunteer efforts to maintain and improve the cemetery grounds. The tour starts at the cemetery
chapel (Pine Street entrance).
item.name: Valley Cemetery Walking Tour
